definition: second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

sentences.english: The fluorosilicon polymers with different vinyl contents were vulcanized by using of benzyl peroxide.
sentences.chinese: 用碘量法测定的乙烯基含量与理论值相符。

sentences.english: It has an attractive black vinyl finish with removable black cloth grilles.
sentences.chinese: 它有一个可移动的黑色网罩诱人的黑色乙烯基完成。

sentences.english: Timecode Vinyls are special records that you can play on any standard turntable.
sentences.chinese: 时间码乙烯基是特别记录，您可以发挥任何标准转台。

sentences.english: Preferably, the vinylpyridine polymer encapsulates the titanium zeolite.
sentences.chinese: 优选乙烯基吡啶聚合物胶囊包封钛沸石。

sentences.english: Neither polystyrenes nor vinyl resins are suitable for this design.
sentences.chinese: 聚笨乙烯和乙烯基树脂都不适合这种设计。

sentences.english: The properties of the blends are very similar to that of middle vinyl polybutadiene rubber.
sentences.chinese: 共混胶性能非常类似于中乙烯基聚丁二烯橡胶。

sentences.english: " Replace "your" old car vinyl surface with new fabric.
sentences.chinese: 更换您的破旧棚房车乙烯基面料与一个新的。

sentences.english: You can clean vinyl siding with regular soap and a scrub brush.
sentences.chinese: 你可以清理乙烯基侧板与普通肥皂和板刷。
还可提供乙烯基材质的布帘。

sentences.english: It is particularly useful for encapsulation where rigid or flexible wire leads are involved such as vinyls.
sentences.chinese: 特别是用于灌封刚性或柔性的乙烯基电线引线。

definition: phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
Ding Ji (1917-1944), real name Li Baicen 李百岑, journalist based in Yanan, martyr of the revolution
